price: Unibuke ubwo Aburahamu na Ismail bazamuraga imisingi y’ingoro (Al Ka’abat), (bagira bati) “Nyagasani wacu! Twakirire (ibikorwa n’ubusabe byacu), mu by’ukuri, wowe uri Uwumva bihebuje, Umumenyi uhebuje.”
arabic: وَإِذۡ يَرۡفَعُ إِبۡرَٰهِـۧمُ ٱلۡقَوَاعِدَ مِنَ ٱلۡبَيۡتِ وَإِسۡمَٰعِيلُ رَبَّنَا تَقَبَّلۡ مِنَّآۖ إِنَّكَ أَنتَ ٱلسَّمِيعُ ٱلۡعَلِيمُ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: wa-idh yarfaʿu ib'rāhīmu al-qawāʿida mina al-bayti wa-is'māʿīlu rabbanā taqabbal minnā innaka anta al-samīʿu al-ʿalīmu
